attributes.action: Stoning of young woman in Pakistan outside the Court in Lahore.
attributes.additional_details: We call upon the UK Government to take up this issues with the Government in Pakistan. We believe that stoning of anyone is barbaric and has no place in the 21 st Century in any part of the world. This particular crime was committed in daylight in full public view which adds to the disbelief of how this could happen without at least tacit approval by the Security forces and Police.
